text: Sorekara mūsā ga nenki o manryō shi, kazoku to issho ni tabi shite iru toki tōru yama no hata ni, itten no hi o mitometa. Kare wa kazoku ni itta. `Anata gata wa matte i nasai. Watashi wa hi o mitometa. Asoko kara anata gata ni shōsoku o motte koyou. Matawa hi-wa o mochi kaette, anata gata o atatameyou
